1.title: Options

112.content:
I was waiting for the plane to start boarding, when I saw an crowd walking down the hall. I put down my iPod to see if I could get a closer look. Most of the people in the crowd were girls, and they were all trying to be in the center of the circle at the same time. Large security guards were doing their best to push the crowd away. Then I saw who they were excited about.

Zac Efron was walking in the middle of the circle, even hotter than I had ever imagined. His perfect brown hair falling around equally pristine features. And his eyes, oh my gosh, his eyes were so amazing. I was suddenly overcome with infatuation, almost causing me to feint in my seat.

"Flight 154 to London now boarding first class passengers, rows one through twenty-five." Came a voice over the intercom. I stood up and began to gather my things. Then I noticed that Zac was moving towards the boarding gate. Was he going to board the same flight as me? The crowd began to disperse as Zac made his way to the gate, handing his ticket to the flight attendant who was eying him eagerly.

I rushed to the gate after him, hurriedly handing my ticket to the flight attendant, who took her sweet time making everything was in order. I practically ran down the boarding ramp and into the plane. Zac sat in the second row, next to the window. It looked like he had two seats to himself. I looked frantically around for where I was going to sit. To my delight, I was sitting across the aisle from him, one row back. I was overcome with joy.

Most of the people who were boarding the plane did a double take when they saw Zac Efron sitting in first class. I smiled to myself, unable to believe my luck.

A man with a silver brief-case sat across the aisle from me, right behind Zac. I ignored him.

11211.content: Suddenly, the plane began to thrash violently. People around me began to scream loudly. All went black.
11211.title: The Crash

112111.content:
After what seemed like an eternity later, I opened my eyes again. Most of the people around me were passed out from lack of oxygen. Looking to the front of the plane, I could see that part of the cockpit was missing. I reached for the oxygen mask, but it was moving around too violently for me to grab it from my seat. I looked down and noticed that my seatbelt was still on. I didn't want to take it off for fear of being thrown out of the plane as it spiraled downwards. Suddenly, a tan, strong hand pulled the mask around my face, providing me with precious oxygen. I looked up to see Zac, his oxygen mask secured around his face.

Zac motioned towards the seat cushions, and then out the window at the ever drawing closer water below. I understood what he meant. Since we were going to land in water, we should use the seat cushions as flotation devices. Unbuckling my seatbelt, I was nearly thrown to the back of the plane from the force of the wind. Zac held on to my arm, pulling me back to the seat. He was holding on to the seat in front of us, and had already grabbed a seat cushion. A strange green ooze covered the ground, leaking from the front of the plane.

Zac pulled me over to the emergency exit, using the chairs to help him move around. Together we managed to pry the door open. The force of the wind pulled us out of the plane.

1553.content:
Patience pays off. After waiting ten minutes, you were caller number 100 on the radio and were given the chance to meet your favorite actor, Jared Padalecki. Now, Supernatural is a great show, but who were you kidding. Among the reasons you watch it is because of Jared and Jensen Ackles, though you would never admit it.

So, as you arrive at the set of Supernatural, you start getting nervous. How long would you get to be with Jared and what would you do? When you reach the set, they were wrapping up the last scene of the day. You watch Jared and Jensen finish their scene and walk off. Nervously, you walk up to Jared.

"Uh, excuse me? Jared. I'm-"

"You won that radio contest right?" Jared asked. You couldn't believe he would remember.

"Yeah, yeah I did". Jared extends a hand.

"Nice to meet you. Come on, i'm headed to my trailer". You walk with Jared to his trailer and inside, you notice it's just you two.

"So, what are we gonna do?" you ask.

"Well, man, I already have it planned out", With that, you notice Jared looks like he's.....growing? No that can't be right, people can't just grow. But the more he grew, the more reality hit you. He was!

Jared stops at
1553.title: Jared Padalecki (Supernatural)

15531.content:
As soon as it started, it stoppped, but you could tell there was a major difference. Jared was definitly bigger.

"H-h-h-how?" you stutter, a little nervous about the bigger man in front of you.

"I've been able to do it since I started the show. It's not that hard to do when you get used to it. I figured I'd start out small so you can get used to it".

Your eyes widened "You mean you can get even bigger?" Jared nodded and smiled. You loved his smile and now that he was bigger, his smile lightened up more of your world.

"So," Jared started talking, his voice a little deeper, "I wanted to go back outside, since it is getting a little cramped in here, but we can stay here if you want."
15531.title: 8 feet tall

info.brief_description: Wherein there are giant male celebrities
info.description:
This is a story about someone shrinking around giant male celebrities or someone shrinking around them.

It is about MEN so no female characters are allowed. Please, this is *writing*.com, so it is presumed that you can write in proper English. If you write in lol-speak or your writing is just atrocious, your chapter will be deleted. The rating is also set at 13+, but it's okay if you move into 18+ territory.

Other than that, have fun! Please feel free to email me about any inquiries or requests.
